title: Lincoln Memorial: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations                         A New Birth of Freedom Abraham Lincoln and the Emancipation Proclamation  Duration:5 minutes, 23 seconds                   Lincoln Memorial Interactive NPS  Lincoln Memorial Interactive Site Launch the Lincoln Memorial Interactive Site. (Flash required) The Lincoln Memorial Interactive site is an immersive virtual tour of the Lincoln Memorial complete with images, detailed information, and video clips.   The following clips are included in the interactive site. Lincoln Interactive (audio only mp3) Dennis Mosso Gil Lyons Jason Martz John Kirkpatrick I John Kirkpatrick II Kathryn Williams Kawther Elmi Nate Adams  Robert Healy I Robert Healy II Robert Healy III Steven Watts Tom Downs      Lincoln Interactive (video requires quicktime player) Very Large Files. Dennis Mosso Gil Lyons  Jason Martz  John Kirkpatrick I John Kirkpatrick II Kathryn Williams Kawther Elmi Nate Adams Robert Healy I Robert Healy II Robert Healy III Steven Watts Tom Downs
